description:
A novice female adventurer. She names the kitten she found in the labyrinth "Tama" and keeps him as her pet. She aspires to be like the "Sword Saint" Alisha, who single-handedly repelled the demons that once attacked her hometown.
She specializes in high-speed combat, taking advantage of her skill, "Acceleration." She has a diligent and kind-hearted personality, but when it comes to Tama, she sometimes displays hints of a rather intense fetish...
Source: Official page
name: Aria
